title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: LOT 1: 2017 BTCC pen, new in box/bagLOT 2: 2018 Lynx Art BTC/XMR note setAll notes are #30/150 except the 0.5BTC which is #31/150Original thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5080645STARTING BID PER LOT: 0.00010BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.00005BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 5 decimal places**END TIME: DECEMBER 21th, 2023, 14:00:00 PST**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT:BTC: bc1qxsynpetjqzcftk828k6u77khy3nf528nqs8qts**If fees are high when auction ends, other cryptocurrencies will be accepted as payment**SHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: NOT DISCLOSED

comments.author: goldlyre
comments.body: **If fees are high when auction ends, other cryptocurrencies will be accepted as payment**This is good.

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: can always use LN - and if in the US and maybe a few other places? could use strike or cash app - both have options to send btc with no fees.

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: Cyrus on December 17, 2023, 01:16:46 AMLot 1: 0.00025BTCQuote from: bitbollo on December 17, 2023, 07:45:49 AMLot 2: 0.0002 btcCurrent high bidsEnds in about 3.5 hours

comments.author: RexRich
comments.body: Thanks, spirited auction... these items rarely come up.

comments.author: rsincognito
comments.body: Quote from: goldlyre on December 17, 2023, 03:46:48 AM**If fees are high when auction ends, other cryptocurrencies will be accepted as payment**This is good.The strike app is sending btc for no fee but has an average of 24 hour waite time,  that’s why I have been using,  also was only like $8 if you wanted it to complete with in about an hour.
